page.title: 18SERVICES
page.content: For its size, Otley has a wide variety of services. It has its own Police Station, Law Courts,and Fire Station, although there is no Ambulance Station. There is an Information Office and a Civic Centre where local events are held. At the Auction Mart on the bank of the river there are weekly sales of farm animals and equipment. The shops include five chain stores selling general foods and household goods. There are three travel agents, and five large garages selling new cars, as well as quite a few repair garages. In summer, boats can be hired to row on the river, and there is an open-air swimming pool. Old gravel pits to the east of the town are used now for sailing small boats.
